name: Space Evader (The Wrong John)
description:
How long can you survive in space?

Touch  screen to control your spaceship.

Will work on on most mobiles tablets if you wait for it to load.

Does NOT work with mouse clicks (working on this).

Screenshot your longest survival time and post in the comments!

Music from Portents

https://thewrongjohn.bandcamp.com/album/portents

Game  Development blog
